reviewText: My son loved it and was really excited to watch it.
My son loves the Wild Kratts! A little disappointed that it only had two episode's on it.

If your kids are a fan of Wild Kratts like mine are, then you won't be disappointed in this DVD.  We have several Wild Kratts DVD's and this one made a great addition.

Episodes include:
Cheetah Racer
Falcon City

**I was sent this product in exchange for a honest review. The opinions above are my own.**
Gread DVD's! Very educational for kids! We have purchased a lot of these DVD's and most likely will continue as long as we have little ones around.  Came on time and in great shape.
I am happy to support such a wonderful family as the Kratt brothers. My son looks up to them and loves what he learns from them. The DVD is great and I received it on time! Thank you!
My son loves this movie....watches it over and over again.
Birthday gift for my nephew who loves the PBS show. He loves this!
Should have more episodes than just 2 on the disk. My son was disappointed.
My kids love Wild Kratts. I find them very educational show.

All Wild Krats movies are great for kids that like to learn about animals.  My grandson has almost all of their videos at 6 years old and can tell you about so many animals, where they live, what they eat, how they live. Super cool movies to be entertained while learning.
